name: part_009
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】ねね～ちらい～ぶ４年目もよろしくね！ゲストいっぱいでお祝い！【 #桃鈴ねねの４年目 】 [5Ney9Z_WnTU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene finishes her performance of the song 'ICHIDAIJI'.
Nene talks to the audience about her special guitar and introduces guest members.
Momosuzu Nene, Omaru Polka, Yukihana Lamy, and Shishiro Botan perform 'Hyper Jumpin''.

subtitles.original: Yeah! Oh!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Oh!

subtitles.original: どうだった？ねねのプロみたいな演奏は。Yeah!
subtitles.english: How was it? Nene's professional-like performance. Yeah!

subtitles.original: 今日、見てみんな、これ。ねね専用のギターを用意してもらいました！
subtitles.english: Look everyone, look at this. I had a Nene-exclusive guitar prepared!

subtitles.original: Yeah! かっこいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: Yeah! Isn't it cool?

subtitles.original: もうすごいソロパートも弾けちゃうんだから。
subtitles.english: I can even play an amazing solo part.

subtitles.original: トゥルルルル... うぉー！
subtitles.english: Trurururu... Whoa!

subtitles.original: このかっこいいローアングルを用意してもらっちゃって。ちょっともう一回いいですか？
subtitles.english: They even prepared this cool low angle for me. Can I do it one more time?

subtitles.original: トゥルルルル... おぉー！
subtitles.english: Trurururu... Ohhh!

subtitles.original: さあ、みんなゲストパートはいかがだったでしょ...
subtitles.english: Now, how did everyone like the guest part...

subtitles.original: ...いかがでしたでしょうかー！
subtitles.english: ...how did you like it!

subtitles.original: いろんな、ね、ホロメンとあぁいうの歌ったらすごい良いんじゃないかなーとか
subtitles.english: I thought it would be really nice to sing that kind of thing with various Holo members,

subtitles.original: いろいろ考えながら選びましたー！
subtitles.english: so I chose it while thinking about all sorts of things!

subtitles.original: 可愛かったでしょ？可愛かったでしょ？
subtitles.english: It was cute, right? It was cute, right?

subtitles.original: さあ、そして、ゲストの、あの、こう、サムネイルにいたけど、
subtitles.english: Now, then, about the guests... they were in the thumbnail,

subtitles.original: まだ出てきてないホロメンがいますよね？
subtitles.english: but there are still some Holo members who haven't appeared yet, right?

subtitles.original: いつもの人たちをお呼びしたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to call out the usual crowd.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね...
subtitles.english: One moment...

subtitles.original: あぁ！あ、ごめん。今行くね！
subtitles.english: Ah! Oh, sorry. I'm coming now!

subtitles.original: Hyper Jumpin'!
subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin'!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original:
Hyper Jumpin'

subtitles.english:
Hyper Jumpin'

subtitles.english: Hyper Jumpin' to the end of dreams

subtitles.original: 一回きり はしゃぐほうが おトクでしょう

subtitles.english: Breaking through the limits, tension rising up

subtitles.original: 邪魔するノイズは 打ち消せバンバンバン

subtitles.original: 遊びたいだけ 安心安心して

subtitles.original: 笑い飛ばして 蹴っ飛ばして 危機一髪 絶体絶命！
subtitles.english: Laugh it off, kick it away, critical moment, desperate situation!
